# request(_:didFailWithError:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate that the request failed to execute.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func request(_ request: SKRequest, didFailWithError error: any Error)
```

## Parameters

- **request**: The request that failed.
- **error**: The error that caused the request to fail.

## Discussion

When the request fails, your application should release the request. The [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKRequestDelegate/requestDidFinish(_:)] method is not called after this method is called.
